3: The battle quickly finished. Peace returns to the church.
Toby is struggling to get on his feet. 'Blood' keeps coming out of his 'wounds', but he is still smiling.
What's with your body...
Something different is happening to me. If only I could die easily like others...
Please, when I am still myself...
Sorry to trouble you... Miss Bianca...
Don't apologize. It's my bad... I couldn't save you...
No... You did. Maybe you have also saved others...
Without you, I could have...hurt someone...
Sorry...
I'm glad that I met you in the end...
...I feel relieved.
After finishing the last line, Toby's legs can no longer hold him up.
Toby falls into his own blood and calmly closes his eyes under the moon.
A lily flower slips out of his arms and falls to the ground, soaked in the red liquid.
...Huh.
Toby's last words still linger in her mind, but his cold body reminds her of reality.
Why... Why do you all trust me so much? Father, and you...
You talked about redemption and relief. But you are all dead!
How can this be redemption...
Aah!
Bianca's thoughts are interrupted by the sudden screaming. She looks over and sees an unexpected guest at the front door.
D... Don't come over here!
The terrified Sister rushes out, leaving no chance for Bianca to get close. Soon, many voices can be heard from all directions...
